history.text: Hello, the movie is The Avengers.
It is a superhero drama.
Do you enjoy superhero movies?
Is the lead character male or female?
I do not enjoy Super hero movies, Do you ?
I believe the main characters are male. There does not seem to be a single protagonist.
It involves various superheros. Some are women but I think the males get more screentime.
Where does this movie take place?
Is this movie geared towards children or adults ?
It takes place in America. It involves a team of superheros trying to stop Loki from subjugating the Earth.
Does it take place in modern ties or in the future ?
I'm not sure but it may appeal to children since there's quite a bit of humor to offset the action.
Is this movie a comedy ?
I'm not too sure. There do seem to be physicists experimenting on unusual forms of energy unlike anything in the present day.
It's primarily Drama and a superhero movie but there are humorous one liners delivered by superheros like Iron Man.
I like documentaries. Do you think I would enjoy this movie ?
Hmm I don't think this has a lot in similar with documentaries. The primary draw of this movie seems to be its action scenes.
My Son enjoys video games. Do you think it he would enjoy it ?
What is the age rating?
I think he might enjoy it depending on what kind of games he enjoys.
It does not say
Does the movie appear to be high quality?
According to critical response it seems to have met with a positive reception.
Rotten tomatoes gives it a 92%
CinemaScore gives it an A+
Is the movie a cartoon or are there real actors and actresses?
There are real actors and actresses
Although there are aliens, wormholes, and so on
Do you know when this movie was made?
It was released in 2012
It seems to take place in New York City
Do you know if it is available on Netflix ?
I'm not really sure but I imagine a movie this highly rated likely will be available.

There are many famous actors such as Robert Downey Jr, Mark Ruffalo
 and Chris Evans.
Do you think I would be familiar with many of the actors/actresses in this film?
Ah, I see :)
Scarlett Johansson also acts in it
Is there anything else you would like to know?
No, I think I have made a decision as to whether r not I would enjoy watching this movie. Thank you :)

uid2response.feedback: Based on the description of this movie, I would not be interested in watching it. I enjoy documentaries.
